channel.title: Coachella on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Girl Group XG on Their Dynamite Coachella Debut and Sharing Their Love for Fans on “Million Places”
item.description: The seven-member global group made their Coachella debut this April, showcasing their dynamic performance skills to a new audience: “We poured our hearts into it.”

item.title: The Best U.S. Music Festivals of 2025, from Lollapalooza to Ohana Fest
item.description: Here’s everything you need to know about this year’s top music events frequented by Hollywood’s elite — from the must-see lineups to detailed ticketing info and more.
